pages.title: Botany Box Recipe
pages.text: $(#25228d)2 Fume, 2 Bark Enforced Sproutling, 1 Empty Seed Packet, 150 Sun value.

text: $(br)$(#bd951a)Special: $()$(#ff0000)Wraps around a Plant, protecting it from most damage.
$(br)$(#bd951a)"Gloom Vine's gloomy exterior shouldn't be seen as implying a gloomy interior. His interior is gloomy, but for complicated personal reasons that go way back."
